sourcesContent:
import React from 'react'; // This component displays the algorithm information at the bottom. export default function AlgorithmInfo({ currentAlgoInfo }) { if (!currentAlgoInfo) { return null; // Don't render anything if there's no info } return (

{currentAlgoInfo.title}

{currentAlgoInfo.description}

Pseudocode

            {currentAlgoInfo.pseudoCode}

Complexity

Time: {currentAlgoInfo.complexity.time}

Space: {currentAlgoInfo.complexity.space}

); }
